Articles.Content:
I send my giant space fleet to your lodge and plant a flag on it making it my lodge.

My crater and super remote lodge

I deorbit and crash my Dres flotilla into your hill. Planned to have 23 ships. Currently have 3 ships. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") there still pretty big.

I set up the bomb. You get signal. Main screen turn on.

**All your hill are belong to us**
I NUKE YOUR HILL!!!

I pile up the radioactive ash into a hill.

My glowing hill

I cover the hill in lead making it safe for use. Then proceed to cover it in dirt and plant grass seeds and a tree on it.

Our safe Hill.

I drop a critical-mass strangelet upon your hill. The strangelet grows quickly, enveloping the hill and surrounding atmosphere. Eventually, the entire planet is consumed.

My planet-sized glob of strange matter.

Being the Moon is still normal matter, I relocate there and claim Mons Hadley in the name of my alliance.

My hill!

Im gonna fight with you, then i spare you and, got the hill. (Undertale pacifist route)

Now hill is mine

I spoke softly, but the big stick I carried knocks you off the hill.

My non-pacifist hill.

I diplomatically convince you to cede the hill to me.

I build a spaceplane on the hill (Hills being easier to reach orbit from, of course.)

you "attempted" to build something then someone said "welcome aboard"

someone said "welcome aboard your plane"

I also post in the "Welcome Aboard" section.

My Welcome Aboard section on the hill.

I make lot of monks, then will i send they to your hill and capture hill by powers or religium

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-31T05:27:30Z" title="03/31/2016 05:27  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 31, 2016</time> by TedwinKnockman66**

Religion defeated by my atheist attitude.

My hill!
Jeb crashes my 5000 ton rocket on the hill. My hi- actually wait... My smoldering giant crater!

I use power of evilphants (evil elephant's) to capture crater(RIP hill 2012-2016), then I repair crater and i will make hill great again. 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-04T17:56:29Z" title="04/04/2016 05:56  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 4, 2016</time> by TedwinKnockman66**
I "borrow" [@Matt Lowne](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/159036-matt-lowne/)'s orbital battle stations and blow the hill up again. My crater!

I assault your hill with the Dolphin military and send you fleeing out of the Solar system, I then take over the Solar System.

My Solar System full of planets with hills on them.
I and the Dres protection group come and nuke your planets. My smoldering craters and lovely Dres hills and canyons.

Convert save file to EUIV  

Shift+2  

bearhaslanded  

tag JMN  

Wait for Stellaris to come out.  

Use converters for EUIV -> Vic 2 -> HOI 3/4 -> Stellaris  

Travel across the galaxy to the Kerbol system.  

Conquer Dres.  

My Smoldering Craters and lovely Dres Hills and Canyons and Galactic Empire.
I hyperedit you away to eve, then shoot eve with star killer base. My lovely Dres and Gilly and big debris field!

> 
> 
> On ‎2015‎-‎01‎-‎18 at 9:00 PM, \_Augustus\_ said:
> 
> 
> I crash Lavinia, Toliman, Serious, Fred, Ginger, Octavia, Blacky Karman, Dolas, Corbo, Nim, Vendela, Oblok, Rolg, Meelok, Balok, Apollo, Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis, and Stella into Kerbol. All of them explode and everything in the Kerbal universe is destroyed.D
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **I AM A GOD!** 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My empty universe.
> 

What mod did you use to get all those stars? & what planets are orbiting around them?

I know kerbols planets are moho, eve, kerbin, duna, dres, jool, sarnus, urlum, neidon, plock.

And I know that barry has barney, stella has plantar, serious has joker, dollas has polo, don, CZF30, and Kaiser, and corbo has ablate, erin, inaccessible, sentar, and accession.

But what are the others?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-19T23:52:02Z" title="04/19/2016 11:52  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 19, 2016</time> by saturnsrings**

I smash you with over posting. 

My cyber hill!

/bin/rm -r -f \*

(That line of text once deleted 90% of Toy Story 2!)

I am the king of my mountain of unused gigabytes.
